text: avarkalil cilar um peccaik ket(patu pol pavanai cey)kinranar; nam avarkalutaiya ullankalil atai vilankik kollatu irukkumaru tiraikalaiyum innum avarkal katukalil cevittut tanmaiyum erpatuttinom; innum avarkal ella attatcikalaiyum parttalum avarrai nampamattarkal; innum ivarkal um'mitam vantal um'motu vatatuvarkal; "ivaiyellam munnorkalutaiya kattuk kataikaleyanri verillai" enru innirakarippor kuruvarkal
